About the Company: Himalchuli Food products was originally incorporated in name of Saheli Leasing and Finance Limited on 13.04.1986 . The name was subsequently changed to Saheli Leasing and Industries Limited. The name was again changed to Himalchuli Food products Limited in year 1998 when the company entered in to business of manufacturing Food Items mainly consisting of bakery Products.
